text: I find this is a bit too sweet. The flavour is very light and easy to drink but I prefer more complex flavours.
Smooth drinking shiraz. It's a bit more than what I would normally spend but was gifted this and loved it!
Such a good shiraz! Highly recommend to those shiraz lovers out there!
I'm not a big fan of this one. Their Premier Cru is much better and worth spending a bit more on, particularly for a special occasion or gift.
Haven't tried their sparklings before, however have enjoyed a few of their other wines. Will give it a try.
As good as it gets for an Aussie sparkling. Not too sweet or gassy, just right.
Such a delightful sparkling! Shared this with some friends last night and saw it here by chance. Highly recommend!
Good Rose. Perfect for a spring or summer afternoon.
This was ok. Personally, I prefer the rose's from Provence. Look forward to seeing some other Rose's listed.
Perfect for any occasion. Was gifted this and so impressed! Light and crisp flavours.
This is probably the best Australian Rose I've tried. Beautiful subtle flavour of cherries and not too sweet.
Smooth chardonnay. Not too oaky. Good to have paired with salmon
This wine is amazing! I tried it recently and really impressed with the characteristics.
